articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: How one young athlete overcame a stroke to pursue her sports dream
articles.description: Kylie Lough, an 18-year-old athlete, faced a harrowing challenge when a stroke, triggered by a previously undiagnosed congenital condition, left her unable to walk for days. Against all odds, her unwavering determination has her back in the game.
